```{r}

glimpse(starwars)

# lets look at the first row of starwars
starwars[1,]

starwars$starships[1]

starwars |>
  select(name, films) |>
  unnest_longer(films)

```


```{r}
table(starwars$sex)


starwars |>
  group_by(sex) 


starwars |> count(sex)


starwars |>
  drop_na(height, sex) |>
  group_by(sex) |>
  summarize(mean_height = mean(height),
            sd_height = sd(height))

```
